trans-unit.source: Defines an activity delegate that has no in arguments and does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 定義活動委派，其中沒有任何 in 引數，且沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: An activity delegate executes an activity that has a required signature, such as the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.ForEach%601> activity that requires an iteration variable or the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch%601> activity that requires an <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 活動委派執行具有需要的簽章，例如<xref:System.Activities.Statements.ForEach%601>需要反覆運算變數或<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch%601>需要<xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception>活動</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Catch%601>的活動</xref:System.Activities.Statements.ForEach%601>的活動

trans-unit.source: There are multiple generic versions of this type that take from 1 to 16 arguments for the activity that is called.
trans-unit.target: 有多個泛型版本這種，讓從 1 到 16 個引數呼叫的活動。

trans-unit.source: There are also <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> types for delegates that return values.
trans-unit.target: 另外還有<xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601>的傳回值的委派類型。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityAction"></xref>類別。
